mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.applyTime AS applytime,a.deviceCoding AS devicecoding,a.deviceName AS devicename,a.Manager AS manager,a.number,a.scrapApplicants AS scrapapplicants,a.Specification AS specification,a.usedPostion AS usedpostion,a.zid,b.name AS zname FROM devicescrappedapplyregist a,zu b WHERE a.zid=b.id
